name: Kinu Shoku Ryuu Hana: Weaving The Blue Orient
summary: Kinu Shoku Ryuu Hana is another Touhou shooting game which is, unfortunately, not very popular due to lack of publicity. With standard gameplay, the gameplay mechanics rely on 2 features: spell card system and spark counter, with the spell card system the player may choose 2 of 7 different spell cards before embarking on a mission. The spark counter consumes magic gauge and is basically very similar to a bomb that will fire lasers to eliminate enemies and bullets. The game's story is around Marisa who is investigating magic fluctuations.
